ques: The fireworks display on New Year's Eve was _________.

To be _________ for the scholarship, you must meet specific criteria.

The article provided only a _________ analysis of the complex issue.
It's _________ to save money for the future.

The _________ blanket kept them warm on cold winter nights.
They decided to go camping in a _________ wilderness area.
He realized that his previous judgments had been _________ and shallow.

The job posting lists the _________ qualifications for applicants.
The memories of that day were _________ and faded.

The decision to take such _________ measures was necessary for safety.
I don't need anything _________ for my birthday, just spend time with me.

He had a _________ view of the situation and didn't consider all perspectives.

Only _________ candidates will be considered for the position.

They have _________ personalities, one is outgoing, and the other is introverted.

They had a _________ understanding of each other's personalities.
